settings.heading: How does this work?
settings.row_content: We work together with the best suppliers who are focused on replicating trending products in a way where no one can notice its not an original. These items can be easily Resold on plattforms like ebay and facebook marketplace and make you alot of profit. Every purchase includes an free Reselling tutorial PDF so you will know how to sell this items for sure.

settings.heading: How is this Product so Cheap?
settings.row_content: Because its only a 1:1 Replica. Replicated to look, work and feel the same. It even has the exact same packaging and valid serial numbers. Resell Depot stands for the lowest prices on the market and we can guarantee that our Website gives you the lowest prices possible.

settings.heading: How do i know this is not a Scam?
settings.row_content: Its understandable that people might suspect our site as a scam as it seems to good to be true. But there is defenitely no Reason to worry! We are an official registered Business and our website exists since over 2 Years. We have almost 5000 Customers of wich are 99% Happy Customers. We also have a 24/7 Support wich you can contact any Time if you need Help.

settings.heading: Where can i find your Reviews?
settings.row_content: Under Every Product you can see all the reviews to that specific Product. But also if you go to our Homepage and scroll all the way down you can see all Reviews.

settings.heading: What happens after i Purchase?
settings.row_content: After you Purchase you will instanlty get an Email Confirmation with the goods you have purchased. Your reselling journey is about to start...

settings.heading: In Wich ways can i contact you?
settings.row_content:
Use the livechat in the bottom right corner. we usually answer in a few minutes. You can also fill out our Contact Form
OR write us an E-Mail at: contact@resell-depot.com

settings.heading: How can i work with you?
settings.row_content: We are working on an affiliate program right now. If you are looking to make an serious income online message our instagram and we will teach you on how to promote our store and we will track every Sale you make and give you a 50% Split of that wich can be payed out monthly or even Daily
